Now It's asking for a new serial number??

I really liked this and you DO NOT have to be disconnected from the internet like some people are saying the instructions are a bit odd though so heres some more accurate ones. 
1. Download.......
2. click on file and it wont automatically open the installer instead it will open slicknator's homebrew GUI which will give you two options. click the top option (SETUP)
3. install completely and run the program now go into preferences and go to the general TAB and about half way down it will say check for updates. Uncheck this box
4. Then in the program window go to help and click enter license code.
5. To get the lisence code youll need to go back to the homebrew gui and on the bottom it has a button called serial. Click it....
6. it will open a window with two text files like always read the read me which explains how to do what im already typing so then just open up the text document thats name serial.
7. use you good ol' copy n paiste function and put it in the program license and then youll be done... 

see no need at all for disabling your internet...

im running windows 7 x64 which was downloaded from a torrent hehe free OS gatta love it :D 

also this program is literally exactly like 
Xilisoft Video Converter Ultimate 6. Im fairly sure the makers just copied each other or something because every function/feature/ button placement is the same in these two programs.. i have always liked imtOO better though

oh and also the cool function for GPU converting is nice i have a ATI HD 5570 card and it really does make a vast speed difference. The time does take less but it only works for certain codec's so keep that in mind before bitching about it not working. it will tell you which codec uses your GPU function and which one doesnt also you have to download extra software to enable that function on your GPU 

hope this helps out anyone else

Hi, I was running in to problems generating the serial number, it looked like nothing was happening, so I shut everything down except for the application, and then saw that the serial number is written to a file of its own, so open this and copied and pasted and now everything is SWEET.  
Thankyou!
Is this updatable or not?

OK people Very Very easy to solve the problem!!
firs in program folder their is vc.exe program
on win7 create block rule for this inbound and outbound
first step done
second step is to change some reg key
open regedit and navigate to
[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Classes\CLSID\{0BB6C95A-CE6C-425a-84F2-EB211CD1A90A}]
change values for those as you can see
"440D54AA8AF58E3D"="1A"
"580950B697F5823D87"="194D31F5CEB1D37DD187"
"481244AA97E58A29"="1B"
"5E0E54A082F8883F97D844"="1B"
"5918569797E09F35"="1A"
and delete all the other keys
start imtoo and see the unregistered is gone!!!!!!!!!!
now if you blocked the vc.exe via fire wall it cant check if the serial is ok so it will not chnage the state of the program back to unregistered
Enjoy:)
